content.description: This route has only 2 bolts before you pull the roof and it's over. It would be a great high ball if it didn't have a 3rd class landing. It is thin and slightly overhanging to a fun deadpoint. Its got three stars compared to the rest of the routes in the area and would have more if it were taller.
content.protection: Two bolts to a chest high anchor on the ledge
content.location: After parking at the pullout walk west/up stream past the bathroom and to the big boulder partially in the water. From the boulder turn left up the steep hill maybe 100 feet. It's the north facing black and white wall that's about 25' tall.

content.description: There are a couple boulders in this area and one bolted route.
